questions.text: A group of elite, well-educated individuals whose main focus was Philippine nationalism, were collectively called?
questions.explanation:
Ilustrados.

	The ilustrados were at the forefront of the Philippine independence movement. The term 'ilustrado' means 'enlightened one'.
